validation.validation: Since the transaction date is before any valid academic periods, mark Is_Student_Charge_for_past_Academic_Period as False.
An Academic Period or Academic Period Type must be provided for a Student Charge with a Housing or Board Charge Type.
Invalid Academic Period Type for the submitted past Student Charge. Please provide the Academic Period Type for the previous Academic Period.
The Academic Period provided is invalid for the Student.
The Academic Period Type provided does not match a valid Academic Period for the Student.

Specify an Academic Period or Academic Period Type. If you don't have those values, either today's current date or the Transaction Date must occur after the student's first academic period begins. The student's first academic period begins on: [date].
Academic Period Type provided is invalid for next Academic Period.

Charge_for_Student_Data.description: Wrapper element for the Apply Student Charge Data

validation.validation: Charge amount must be greater than zero.
Charge items with type of Refund Recovery cannot be submitted by this task.
The student already has an unlocked student charge for the charge item in the academic period. Adjust the existing charge instead of applying another charge.
Change the Currency to match the Student Default
The student for this charge is not matriculated. You can only apply charges to matriculated students.

Charge_for_Student_Data.description: Wrapper element for Adjust Student Charge Data

validation.validation: A Charge Adjustment Reason is required.
The following are valid Charge Adjustment Reasons: [reasons]
Submit an amount that is greater than or equal to zero.
You can't unlock this student charge because the student has other locked charges for the same charge item in the academic period. To remove this charge, adjust the amount to zero.
You can’t unlock a charge that was applied manually. Change the Locked field to True or remove the charge from the request.
You can't adjust this [additional][course]fee because the student has a more recent [additional][course]fee for the same course section in the academic period.
Decimal precision of [precision] for [currency] exceeded for amount: [amount]
You must adjust the Due Date, Locked status, or Amount of the charge.

description: Wrapper element for Charge for Student Data

validation.validation: Either enter unused ID and populate Apply Student Charge Data element, or enter ID for a known initial charge and populate Adjust Student Charge Data element

[reasons]
